content:
# I successfully crafted 1 Stone Furnace! 
# My inventory now contains:
# - 1 Stone Furnace
# - 5 Coal
# - 5 Stone
# - 5 Iron Ore

# Step 27: Next, I will place the Stone Furnace near my current position to start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# First, I need to move to a suitable position for placing the furnace.
move_to(Position(x=-11.5, y=-11.5))  # Moving to the stone patch position to place the furnace nearby.
